name: Ley Wanderer
description: The Ley Wanderer is a huge aberration with extraordinary magical capabilities and a physical presence. It has a strong build with notable facial features that hint at its psychic prowess.
memorable: This creature is capable of draining magic and absorbing spells, making it a formidable adversary in magical encounters.
goals: Typically seeks to disrupt magic and consume magical energy from items and creatures.
relations: Often associated with other aberrant creatures or beings that manipulate magic.
environment: Commonly found in areas rich in magical energy, such as ley lines.
strengths: Immunities to psychic damage and resistances to non-magical attacks enhance its survivability.
weaknesses: Average dexterity makes it vulnerable to physical attacks.
attacks: Utilizes a combination of a melee slam attack and a ranged psychic lash attack, both of which deal significant psychic damage.
most_powerful_ability: Dispelling Burst, which disrupts spells and deals psychic damage within a wide radius.
senses: Has the ability to sense magic within 120 feet at will, enhancing its detection and manipulation of magical energies.
skills: Possesses average perception skills, indicating some capacity to detect hidden creatures or objects.
additional_information: Can teleport itself and others to familiar locations.
Drains magic from items to gain temporary hit points.
Absorbs spell energy used against it as a countermeasure.
test_queries: huge creature with magic absorption abilities
magic predator in ley rich environment
huge psychic enemy that drains magic
